item.title: Day03 - Smart Contract Auditing Heuristics
item.description: I found this cool repo on Github that has a list of heuristics for auditing smart contracts. I thought it would be a good idea to go through them and see if I can find more interesting. Code asymmetries In many projects, there should be some symmetries for different functions. For instance, a withdraw function should (usually) undo all the state changes of a deposit function and a delete function should undo all the state changes of the corresponding add function.
